TopicTitle: Is there going to be an option to buy a "family pack" for the game? Also, how will multiplayer work regarding accounts?

Articles.Content:
Is there going to be an option to buy a "family pack" (pack of 4 or another number of game downloads) for the game? I have two other family members who will want to play it with me when the multiplayer feature comes out. And on that note, how will multiplayer work regarding accounts? Will it use a private division account, a steam account, no account, a discord account or something else?

@Nate Simpson @Intercept Games
